name: sfchronicle
text: In a joint letter, five Black members of Oakland‚Äôs Reimagining Public Safety Task Force say they don‚Äôt want to see the number of police reduced until the task force comes up with a comparable or better solution. https://t.co/wL1WxB9hfP

name: sfchronicle
text: ‚ÄúBlack lives are being lost (and) harmed at an alarming rate in our city,‚Äù said the letter, written just as Oakland logged 100 homicides for the year so far ‚Äî the highest number since 2012. https://t.co/xuwaFY1cZJ

name: sfchronicle
text: ‚ÄúEven more lives will be lost if police are removed without an alternative response being put in place that is guaranteed to work as good as or better than the current system,‚Äù said the letter, written as Oakland logged 100 homicides for the year so far. https://t.co/cAuF9112BS

text:
